programme.title: Lockdown
programme.desc: When the federal government imposes a lockdown to control a global pandemic, corona virus plaguing the world, two couples, who have been married for years and thought they knew each other, find that spending so much time together in the confined space of their home may not be a good thing. Hidden secrets will be uncovered, and weaknesses will be known. How will they cope and whose secret is worse?

programme.title: Forever Is A Lie
programme.desc: Jason and Ivy are a young couple and partners in love and in crime as they get money from commiting fraudulent activities against unsuspecting victims, however things start to go wrong when jealousy seeps in and one of them takes things too far. Starring Jessica Tse, Chuddy Davidson, Dante Okere

programme.title: For Better For Trouble
programme.desc: Tensions rise in the household of a newly married couple when the husband brings home an uncouth maid.

programme.title: The Hit list
programme.desc: A well-known lothario, who keeps a journal of his ‘Hit List’, finds his head turned when his neighbour, the next person on his list, is more than he expected.

programme.title: Get Over It
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Muna tries to help her friend, Hauwa, who has just been dumped by her boyfriend. Muna begins a YouTube series to help her friend get out of that post relationship depression by encouraging her to despise men, but she falls in love with their very annoying neighbour instead. Tired of hiding her new relationship, she is stuck with the options of either risking her friendship and career or risking a chance at love.

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk Season 7 - Iyimide Olumoko
programme.desc: Brand new season with A list Nollywood celebrities! Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits it's all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: Uche Who Works In Lekki
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Uche Who Works In Lekki is a black comedy about an ad agency exec who makes a grave mistake by overpromising a payment to a hard-to-get Afrobeat star without the knowledge of his agency and must do everything possible to rectify it before his boss finds out.

programme.title: Cat And Dog
programme.desc: A pair of young tenants are constantly at odds with their landlord due to unpaid rent. She decides to make their living arrangement very uncomfortable for them.

programme.title: Ralia's Secret
programme.desc: Ralia, feeling conflicted and burdened by a secret plan she harbours, must protect her secret at all cost when a familiar face from her past finds her and threatens to unravel her plans.

programme.title: Dionee
programme.desc: Paul, a young mechanic, falls in love with an orange-seller, Dionee, and decides to send her to the city and pay for her education. After some time Paul proposes to her but Dionee rejects him, deciding she can do better than an illiterate man.

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk Season 7 - Chuks Joseph
programme.desc: Brand new season with A list Nollywood celebrities! Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits it's all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: Imperfect Lady
programme.desc: As tension rises within her marriage because of their childlessness, Tosin falls back into the arms of her ex-boyfriend.

programme.title: Again
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Just as they are on the verge of divorce, Nifemi and Seun start to reconsider their stance and see their relationship in new light. Are they willing to give their love another chance and try to repair a damaged marriage that just may never recover?

programme.title: Blurred
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A young couple decide to have an open marriage after being plagued by infidelity for a number of years; putting in place rules of engagement to make sure their relationship stays safe. Things get complicated when one of them falls in love with their new lover and seriously contemplates ending their marriage.

programme.title: Moving On
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A handsome oil magnet and overly faithful husband finds his classy and sassy wife in bed with another man in their home. Upon threatening to divorce her, she stages an accident with the help of her best friend, a medical doctor, and fakes amnesia.
